elemental_tetris.title: ‚ùìWhat is Element Tetris?‚ùì
elemental_tetris.description:
The total % across elements must add up to the specified amount to nullify damage.

Ex. Dark Espers Scorn: Requires 400% Fire/Wind/Water/Dark to survive turns 5/10/15/etc.

100% Fire / 50% Wind / 50% Water / 200% Dark = 400% total, ‚úÖsuccess!
400% Fire / 0% Wind / 0% Water / 0% Dark = 400% total, ‚úÖsuccess!
80% Fire / 20% Wind / 20% Water / 70% Dark = 190% total, ‚ùåfail!

üëâAll party members need all resists.
üëâBuffs and imperils work. Buffing 70% all element resist will only require 120% Fire/Wind/Water/Dark.

1‚É£Dark Espers Scorn: 400% Fire/Wind/Water/Dark and 420% Fire/Water/Dark
2‚É£Ultros/Typhon Scorn: 100% Lightning, 50% Fire, 20% Earth/Water/Wind
3‚É£Lich: 50+% Fire/Ice/Lightning
4‚É£Glacial Scorn: 380% Ice/Water/Wind

üëâ[See Furcula's post for more information.](https://bit.ly/2L54eY4)

new_player_info.title: **:exclamation:New Player Info:exclamation:**
new_player_info.description:
**Important:**
:point_right:One team can't do everything, you'll need specific setups for each encounter
:point_right:Story is very easy, take any 5 units you want
:point_right:5:star: Ashe and Lightning are guaranteed, free units. They are sufficient for story content. Ashe is normally a 4:star: base unit.
:point_right:Friend units have a 3 hour cooldown
:point_right:Visit #global-friends to find strong friends to clear harder encounters
:point_right:When making STMR, fuse two 7:star: together

**Never:**
:point_right:Never sell any 3:star: or higher units, ever
:point_right:Never fuse any 5:star: units together, ever
:point_right:Never buy magic keys
:point_right:Never use tickets on the "Rare Summon" banner at the very bottom
:point_right:Never use max-level King Metal Cactuars on non-7:star: units

**Avoid:**
:point_right:Avoid lapis reviving if you die
:point_right:Avoid NRG refreshing with lapis (buy the NRG daily if you must)
:point_right:Avoid doing the 500 lapis single pull
:point_right:Avoid fusing a 5:star: into a 7:star: for the 50% moogle (wait for 4th copy, then make two 7:star:)

ruler.title: Why Ruler Is Cooler
ruler.description: Her iron will is so dummy thicc the sound of it's ass cheeks scares away enemies and make them cry.
